title: Static route for LoL traffic
body: I typically connect to the internet through a VPN. What would the static route addresses be for LoL so that the game traffic doesn't go through a VPN?

replies.body:
I'm not sure static route information is publically available, however, you can check what your network routing looks like by disabling your VPN and running a traceroute. You can do so by grabbing [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) and running a trace to 192.64.170.1 for 5 minutes, then exporting the results as a Text. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
